level.heading: Required annual reports of Commissioner--Publication and distribution.
level.text: After May 18, 1910, the annual reports of the Commissioner of Insurance and Securities shall be printed and bound in 1 volume, and shall be ready for distribution not later than the 1st day of the next regular session of Congress thereafter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-268, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-201.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Department of Insurance abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-201.
